tutorial.setup: Lie flat on bench with eyes under the bar. Feet flat on floor, shoulder blades retracted and depressed. Grip bar slightly wider than shoulder width.
tutorial.execution: Unrack bar with arms locked. Lower bar to mid-chest with elbows at 45-75 degrees. Touch chest lightly, then press up and slightly back toward rack position.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on press

tutorial.setup: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline. Lie back with eyes under bar, feet flat on floor, shoulder blades retracted.
tutorial.execution: Unrack and lower bar to upper chest/clavicle area. Press up in slight arc back toward rack.
commonMistakes: Bench angle too steep (becomes shoulder press)
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on press

tutorial.setup: Sit on bench with dumbbells on thighs. Kick back while lying down, bringing dumbbells to chest level. Feet flat, back arched, shoulders retracted.
tutorial.execution: Press dumbbells up until arms are extended, bringing them together at top. Lower with control to chest level.
commonMistakes: Dumbbells drifting too far forward or back
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on press

tutorial.setup: Set bench to 30-45 degrees. Sit with dumbbells on thighs, kick back to starting position.
tutorial.execution: Press dumbbells up and together, lower to upper chest with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on press

tutorial.setup: Lie flat on bench with dumbbells extended above chest, palms facing each other, slight bend in elbows.
tutorial.execution: Lower dumbbells in wide arc until chest stretch is felt. Squeeze chest to bring dumbbells back together.
cues: Squeeze at top like hugging a tree
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on squeeze

tutorial.setup: Set cables to high position. Stand in center with staggered stance, slight forward lean. Grab handles with arms extended wide.
tutorial.execution: Bring hands together in front of body in hugging motion. Squeeze chest, then control back to start.
cues: Cross hands at bottom for peak contraction
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale as you bring cables together

tutorial.setup: Set cables to mid-height (shoulder level). Stand in center with staggered stance, arms extended wide with slight elbow bend.
tutorial.execution: Bring hands together in front of chest in a hugging arc motion. Squeeze chest, then control back to start.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on squeeze, inhale on stretch

tutorial.setup: Set cables to low position. Place incline bench (30-45 degrees) between cables. Lie back, grab handles with arms extended wide.
tutorial.execution: Bring hands together above upper chest in arc motion. Squeeze at top, lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on squeeze, inhale on stretch

tutorial.setup: Set cables to high position. Place decline bench between cables. Lie back with head lower than hips, grab handles.
tutorial.execution: Bring hands together above lower chest in arc motion. Squeeze at bottom, control back to start.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on squeeze, inhale on stretch

tutorial.setup: Hands slightly wider than shoulder width, body in straight line from head to heels, core braced.
tutorial.execution: Lower chest to floor by bending elbows to 45 degrees. Push back up to full extension.
cues: Body stays rigid like a plank
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on push

tutorial.setup: Grip parallel bars, jump up to locked arm position. Lean torso forward 15-30 degrees.
tutorial.execution: Lower body by bending elbows until deep stretch in chest. Push back up to full lockout.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on push

tutorial.setup: Adjust seat so handles are at mid-chest level. Sit with back flat against pad, feet on floor.
tutorial.execution: Press handles forward until arms are extended. Control back to start position.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on press, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Adjust seat so handles/pads are at chest level. Sit with back flat, grab handles or place forearms on pads.
tutorial.execution: Bring arms together in front of chest, squeezing at peak. Control back to stretch position.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on squeeze, inhale on stretch

tutorial.setup: Adjust seat so handles align with mid-chest. Sit with back flat against pad, feet firmly on floor. Load plates evenly on both sides.
tutorial.execution: Press handles forward until arms are extended. Control back to start position with a stretch in the chest.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on press, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Adjust seat so handles align with upper chest. Sit with back flat against pad, feet firmly on floor. Load plates evenly on both sides.
tutorial.execution: Press handles forward and slightly up until arms are extended. Control back to start position with a stretch in the upper chest.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on press, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, hinge at hips until torso is 45-60 degrees. Grip bar just outside knees, arms hanging straight.
tutorial.execution: Pull bar to lower chest/upper abdomen, driving elbows back. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Place one knee and hand on bench, other foot on floor. Hold dumbbell in free hand, arm hanging straight, back flat.
tutorial.execution: Pull dumbbell to hip, driving elbow toward ceiling. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline. Lie face down with chest against pad, feet on floor for stability. Hold dumbbells with arms hanging straight down.
tutorial.execution: Row both dumbbells up toward hips, squeezing shoulder blades together. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Hang from bar with overhand grip slightly wider than shoulders. Arms fully extended, shoulders engaged.
tutorial.execution: Pull body up until chin clears bar, driving elbows down and back. Lower with control to full hang.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Use a box or jump to get chin above bar with overhand grip. Start at the top position.
tutorial.execution: Lower yourself as slowly as possible (3-5 seconds) until arms are fully extended. Step back up and repeat.
commonMistakes: Not starting from full top position
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale at top, slow exhale during descent

tutorial.setup: Hang from bar with underhand (supinated) grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
tutorial.execution: Pull body up until chin clears bar. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Sit at lat pulldown machine, thighs secured under pads. Grip bar wider than shoulders with overhand grip.
tutorial.execution: Pull bar to upper chest, driving elbows down and back. Control bar back to full extension.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on release

tutorial.setup: Sit at cable row station, feet on platform, knees slightly bent. Grab handle with arms extended, back straight.
tutorial.execution: Pull handle to lower chest/upper abdomen, squeezing shoulder blades. Extend arms with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on extend

tutorial.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, bar over mid-foot. Hinge and grip bar just outside legs. Chest up, back flat, hips back.
tutorial.execution: Drive through floor, extending hips and knees together. Stand tall at top, then reverse the movement.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Big breath and brace before lift, exhale at top

tutorial.setup: Stand holding barbell at hip height, feet hip-width, slight knee bend. Shoulders back, chest up.
tutorial.execution: Hinge at hips, pushing them back while lowering bar along legs. Go until hamstring stretch, then drive hips forward to stand.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on drive up

tutorial.setup: Stand on one leg holding dumbbell or kettlebell in opposite hand. Slight bend in standing leg.
tutorial.execution: Hinge at hip, lowering weight toward floor while raising back leg behind you. Return to standing by driving through hip.
cues: Back leg and torso move as one unit
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on drive up

tutorial.setup: Hold dumbbells or kettlebells at sides. Stagger stance with one foot slightly behind the other, back heel raised.
tutorial.execution: Hinge at hips, lowering weights along front leg. Most weight stays on front leg. Drive hips forward to return.
cues: Back foot is for balance only
commonMistakes: Back leg doing too much work
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on drive up

tutorial.setup: Straddle T-bar or landmine setup. Hinge at hips, grip handles, back flat, chest up.
tutorial.execution: Pull weight to chest, driving elbows back. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Set cable to face height with rope attachment. Grip rope with overhand grip, step back for tension.
tutorial.execution: Pull rope to face, separating hands and externally rotating shoulders. Squeeze rear delts, return with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Position yourself on the back extension bench with hips on pad, ankles secured under rollers. Cross arms over chest or behind head.
tutorial.execution: Lower torso toward floor by hinging at hips. Raise back up until body is in a straight line, squeezing lower back and glutes at top.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on extension

tutorial.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, bar racked on front delts. Grip just outside shoulders, elbows slightly in front of bar.
tutorial.execution: Press bar straight up, moving head back then forward as bar passes. Lock out overhead, bar over mid-foot.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Big breath and brace, press and exhale at top

tutorial.setup: Sit on bench with back support or stand with feet hip-width. Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms forward.
tutorial.execution: Press dumbbells overhead until arms are extended. Lower with control to shoulder height.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on press, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Adjust seat so handles are at shoulder height. Sit with back flat against pad, feet on floor. Load plates evenly on both sides.
tutorial.execution: Press handles overhead until arms are extended. Lower with control to shoulder height.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on press, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand with dumbbells at sides, slight bend in elbows, palms facing body.
tutorial.execution: Raise arms out to sides until parallel with floor. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand with dumbbells in front of thighs, palms facing body, slight elbow bend.
tutorial.execution: Raise one or both dumbbells to shoulder height in front. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Hinge at hips with dumbbells hanging below chest, slight elbow bend, palms facing each other.
tutorial.execution: Raise arms out to sides, squeezing rear delts. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand sideways to low cable, grip handle with far hand across body.
tutorial.execution: Raise arm out to side until parallel. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Adjust seat height so pads rest on outer arms just above elbows. Sit with back against pad, grip handles lightly.
tutorial.execution: Raise arms out to sides by pushing against pads until arms are parallel to floor. Lower with control.
cues: Push through the elbows not hands
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing you (like top of a curl).
tutorial.execution: Press up while rotating palms to face forward at top. Reverse on the way down.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on press, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand holding bar with shoulder-width or slightly narrower grip, arms extended.
tutorial.execution: Pull bar up along body to chin level, elbows leading. Lower with control.
cues: Elbows higher than hands at top
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand holding weight at sides (dumbbells) or in front (barbell), arms straight.
tutorial.execution: Shrug shoulders straight up toward ears. Hold briefly, lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on shrug, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand with feet hip-width, hold barbell with underhand grip at shoulder width, arms extended.
tutorial.execution: Curl bar up toward shoulders, keeping elbows stationary at sides. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand or sit with dumbbells at sides, palms facing forward.
tutorial.execution: Curl dumbbells up toward shoulders, keeping elbows stationary. Can alternate or do both together.
cues: Supinate (turn pinky up) at top for extra squeeze
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing each other (neutral grip).
tutorial.execution: Curl dumbbells up keeping neutral grip throughout. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Sit at preacher bench with armpits at top of pad. Hold weight with arms extended on pad.
tutorial.execution: Curl weight up, keeping arms on pad throughout. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Sit on bench, spread legs, brace elbow against inner thigh. Hold dumbbell with arm extended.
tutorial.execution: Curl dumbbell up toward shoulder, squeezing at top. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand facing low cable with straight bar or EZ bar attachment. Arms extended, grip underhand.
tutorial.execution: Curl handle up toward shoulders, elbows stationary. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Set bench to 45-60 degree incline. Sit back with dumbbells hanging at sides, arms perpendicular to floor.
tutorial.execution: Curl dumbbells up toward shoulders. Lower with control to full stretch.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand at high cable with straight bar, V-bar, or rope. Grip with arms bent, elbows at sides.
tutorial.execution: Push handle down until arms are fully extended. Return with control, keeping elbows pinned.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on push, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Lie on bench holding weight with arms extended over chest. Can use EZ bar, straight bar, or dumbbells.
tutorial.execution: Bend elbows to lower weight toward forehead/behind head, keeping upper arms still. Extend back up.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on lower, exhale on extend

tutorial.setup: Lie on bench, grip bar with hands 12-16 inches apart. Unrack with arms locked.
tutorial.execution: Lower bar to lower chest, keeping elbows tucked at sides. Press back up.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on lower, exhale on press

tutorial.setup: Stand or sit holding dumbbell or cable overhead with both hands, arms extended.
tutorial.execution: Lower weight behind head by bending elbows. Extend arms back up overhead.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on lower, exhale on extend

tutorial.setup: Place hands on bench behind you, fingers forward. Legs extended or bent, heels on floor.
tutorial.execution: Lower body by bending elbows until 90 degrees. Push back up to full extension.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on lower, exhale on push

tutorial.setup: Hinge at hips with one hand on bench or knee for support. Hold dumbbell with arm bent 90 degrees, upper arm parallel to floor.
tutorial.execution: Extend arm straight back until fully locked out. Return to 90 degrees with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on extend, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Bar on upper back (high bar) or rear delts (low bar). Feet shoulder-width or wider, toes slightly out. Unrack and step back.
tutorial.execution: Break at hips and knees simultaneously. Descend until hip crease is below knee (parallel+). Drive up through whole foot.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Big breath and brace at top, hold through rep, exhale at top

tutorial.setup: Bar rests on front delts in clean grip or cross-arm grip. Elbows high, chest up. Feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out.
tutorial.execution: Descend with upright torso to below parallel. Drive up keeping elbows high.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Big breath at top, brace, exhale at top

tutorial.setup: Hold dumbbell or kettlebell at chest, cupped in both hands. Feet shoulder-width or wider, toes out.
tutorial.execution: Squat down between legs, elbows tracking inside knees. Descend to depth, drive up.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on drive

tutorial.setup: Sit in leg press with back flat against pad. Feet shoulder-width on platform, toes slightly out.
tutorial.execution: Lower weight by bending knees until 90 degrees. Press through whole foot to extend.
cues: Don't go too deep (lower back rounding)
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on lower, exhale on press

tutorial.setup: Sit in machine with back against pad, ankles behind roller pad. Adjust so knee is in line with pivot point.
tutorial.execution: Extend legs until straight, squeeze quads at top. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on extend, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Lie face down (lying) or sit (seated) with ankles under/above pad. Knee in line with pivot point.
tutorial.execution: Curl heels toward glutes. Squeeze hamstrings at contraction. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand with feet together, weights at sides or bar on back. Core braced.
tutorial.execution: Step forward into lunge, lowering until both knees at 90 degrees. Drive through front heel to step forward into next lunge.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on step, exhale on drive

tutorial.setup: Stand 2-3 feet in front of bench. Place rear foot on bench, laces down. Front foot flat on floor.
tutorial.execution: Lower by bending front knee until back knee nearly touches floor. Drive up through front foot.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on lower, exhale on drive

tutorial.setup: Stand facing box or bench at knee height or below. Hold dumbbells at sides.
tutorial.execution: Place one foot on box, drive through that leg to stand up. Step down with control.
cues: Drive through the heel on box
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on step up, inhale on step down

tutorial.setup: Position shoulders under pads of standing calf raise machine. Balls of feet on platform, heels hanging off.
tutorial.execution: Lower heels for full stretch, then raise up onto balls of feet as high as possible. Squeeze at top.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Sit on seated calf raise machine with knees under pad. Balls of feet on platform, heels hanging off.
tutorial.execution: Lower heels for full stretch, then raise up as high as possible. Squeeze at top.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Sit with upper back against bench, barbell over hips (use pad). Feet flat on floor, shoulder-width apart.
tutorial.execution: Drive through heels, extending hips until torso is parallel to floor. Squeeze glutes hard at top. Lower with control.
cues: Chin tucked (look at knees at top)
Feet positioned so shins are vertical at top
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on thrust, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Lie on back with knees bent, feet flat on floor hip-width apart. Weight on hips if using.
tutorial.execution: Drive through heels, lifting hips until body forms straight line from knees to shoulders. Squeeze glutes, lower with control.
cues: Feet not too far forward or back
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on lift, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Stand facing away from low cable, rope between legs. Walk forward for tension, hinge at hips.
tutorial.execution: Drive hips forward to standing, squeezing glutes. Hinge back with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on stand, inhale on hinge

tutorial.setup: Wide stance with toes pointed out 45 degrees. Grip bar inside legs with arms straight. Chest up, hips down.
tutorial.execution: Drive through floor, extending hips and knees. Stand tall, then reverse to floor.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Big breath and brace, lift, exhale at top

tutorial.setup: Forearms on ground, elbows under shoulders. Toes on ground, body in straight line.
tutorial.execution: Hold position, keeping core braced and body straight from head to heels.
cues: Don't let hips sag or pike
tutorial.breathingPattern: Breathe normally while maintaining brace

tutorial.setup: Secure feet under pads on decline bench. Lie back with hands across chest or behind head.
tutorial.execution: Curl torso up toward thighs, squeezing abs. Lower with control back to starting position.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on the way up, inhale on the way down

tutorial.setup: Lie flat on back with arms extended overhead and legs straight.
tutorial.execution: Simultaneously lift legs and torso, reaching hands toward toes to form a V shape. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on the way up, inhale on the way down

tutorial.setup: Lie on back with knees bent, feet flat on floor. Hands across chest or lightly behind head.
tutorial.execution: Curl shoulders off the ground by contracting abs. Lift until shoulder blades clear the floor. Lower with control.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on the way up, inhale on the way down

tutorial.setup: Lie on back with knees bent, feet flat on floor or anchored. Hands across chest or behind head.
tutorial.execution: Curl torso all the way up until chest meets thighs. Lower with control back to floor.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on the way up, inhale on the way down

tutorial.setup: Lie on bench, grip behind head for anchor. Lift legs and hips off bench, body straight from shoulders to toes.
tutorial.execution: Lower body as one rigid unit toward bench, keeping only upper back in contact. Raise back up with control.
cues: Body stays straight like a plank
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale at top, exhale during lowering

tutorial.setup: Lie on back with arms extended toward ceiling, knees bent 90 degrees above hips.
tutorial.execution: Slowly lower opposite arm and leg toward floor while keeping lower back pressed into ground. Return and switch sides.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on extension, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Start on hands and knees, hands under shoulders, knees under hips. Spine neutral.
tutorial.execution: Extend opposite arm and leg until parallel with floor. Hold briefly, return with control. Switch sides.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on extension, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Hang from pull-up bar with overhand grip, arms fully extended, legs straight.
tutorial.execution: Raise legs by flexing hips and curling pelvis, bringing legs up until parallel or higher. Lower with control.
cues: Keep legs straight or bend knees for easier
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on raise, inhale on lower

tutorial.setup: Set cable to high (chop down) or low (chop up). Stand sideways to cable, feet wider than shoulders.
tutorial.execution: Rotate torso to pull cable diagonally across body. Control back to start.
cues: Rotation comes from core, not arms
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on rotation, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Sit on floor with knees bent, feet flat or raised. Lean back slightly, holding weight at chest.
tutorial.execution: Rotate torso to touch weight to floor on each side, keeping core braced.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on each rotation

tutorial.setup: Kneel with ab wheel or barbell in hands. Core braced, arms extended.
tutorial.execution: Roll forward with straight arms until body is extended. Contract abs to roll back to start.
cues: Go only as far as you can control
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on roll out, exhale on roll back

tutorial.setup: Start in push-up position, hands under shoulders, body in straight line.
tutorial.execution: Drive one knee toward chest, then quickly switch legs in running motion.
commonMistakes: Moving too fast with poor form
tutorial.breathingPattern: Rhythmic breathing, don't hold breath

tutorial.setup: Stand sideways to cable at chest height. Hold handle at chest, feet shoulder-width.
tutorial.execution: Press handle straight out from chest, resisting rotation. Hold briefly, return to chest.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on press, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Stand holding heavy dumbbells or kettlebells at sides. Shoulders back, core braced.
tutorial.execution: Walk with controlled steps for distance or time. Maintain posture throughout.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Breathe normally, don't hold breath

tutorial.setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width, kettlebell on floor slightly in front. Hinge and grip with both hands.
tutorial.execution: Hike kettlebell back between legs, then explosively drive hips forward to swing kettlebell to chest height. Let it fall and repeat.
cues: Power comes from hips, not arms
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale sharply at top of swing

tutorial.setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width.
tutorial.execution: Squat down, place hands on floor. Jump feet back to plank. Do a push-up. Jump feet to hands. Explosively jump up with arms overhead.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on jump up

tutorial.setup: Stand facing box at appropriate height. Feet shoulder-width.
tutorial.execution: Swing arms back, then explosively jump onto box, landing with soft knees. Stand tall, step down and repeat.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on jump

tutorial.setup: Stand facing anchor point with rope end in each hand. Knees slightly bent, core braced.
tutorial.execution: Create waves by alternating arms up and down (alternating waves), both arms together (double waves), or side to side (snakes).
tutorial.breathingPattern: Rhythmic breathing throughout

tutorial.setup: Hold weight at shoulder height (front rack position). Feet shoulder-width.
tutorial.execution: Squat to full depth, then explosively stand while pressing weight overhead in one fluid motion. Lower weight to shoulders as you descend into next rep.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on drive and press

tutorial.setup: Stand over weight with feet hip-width. Hinge and grip with straight arms.
tutorial.execution: Explosively pull weight from floor to shoulders (clean) in one motion. Then press overhead. Lower to shoulders, then to floor.
cues: Catch at shoulders with soft knees
commonMistakes: Pulling with arms instead of hips
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on clean, exhale on press

tutorial.setup: Sit on rower, feet strapped in. Grip handle with overhand grip. Start with knees bent, arms extended, back straight.
tutorial.execution: Drive with legs first, then lean back slightly, then pull handle to lower chest. Return in reverse order: arms, body, legs.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on drive, inhale on recovery

tutorial.setup: Sit on bike, feet on pedals, hands on handles. Adjust seat height so slight bend in knee at bottom of pedal stroke.
tutorial.execution: Push and pull handles while pedaling. Resistance increases with effort.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Rhythmic breathing based on intensity

tutorial.setup: Hold rope handles at hip height, rope behind you. Feet together.
tutorial.execution: Swing rope overhead and jump as it passes under feet. Land softly on balls of feet.
cues: Small jumps, just clear the rope
Turn rope with wrists, not arms
commonMistakes: Using whole arm to turn rope
tutorial.breathingPattern: Rhythmic breathing

tutorial.setup: Step onto machine, grip handrails lightly for balance. Start at slow speed.
tutorial.execution: Step continuously, driving through whole foot. Maintain upright posture.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Rhythmic breathing based on intensity

tutorial.setup: Grip sled handles with extended arms. Lean into sled at 45 degree angle.
tutorial.execution: Drive through legs, pushing sled forward with quick, powerful steps. Maintain forward lean.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale forcefully with each drive

tutorial.setup: Stand facing the SkiErg with feet shoulder-width apart. Grip handles with arms extended overhead.
tutorial.execution: Pull handles down in a fluid motion, hinging at hips and bending knees slightly. Drive through the pull using lats and core. Return to start with control.
cues: Drive with lats not just arms
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on pull, inhale on return

tutorial.setup: Stand facing wall, feet shoulder-width apart, holding medicine ball at chest height.
tutorial.execution: Squat down until thighs are parallel. Explosively stand and throw ball to target on wall. Catch ball and immediately descend into next rep.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on throw

tutorial.setup: Face the sled with rope/strap in hands. Athletic stance with knees bent.
tutorial.execution: Pull sled toward you using arms and legs, walking backward or standing stationary. Maintain tension throughout.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Breathe rhythmically with pulls

tutorial.setup: Hold sandbag on shoulders or bear hug position. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.
tutorial.execution: Step forward into a lunge, lowering back knee toward ground. Push through front heel to return to standing. Alternate legs.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Inhale on descent, exhale on drive up

tutorial.setup: Set treadmill to desired speed and incline. Start with warm-up pace.
tutorial.execution: Run with proper form - midfoot strike, arms at 90 degrees, slight forward lean.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Find a rhythm that works for your pace

tutorial.setup: Choose appropriate terrain and route. Warm up with light jog or dynamic stretches.
tutorial.execution: Run with proper form - midfoot strike, arms at 90 degrees, slight forward lean.
tutorial.breathingPattern: Find a rhythm that works for your pace

tutorial.setup: Sit on a bench with forearms resting on your thighs, wrists hanging over knees.
tutorial.execution: Grip the barbell with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart. Let the barbell roll down to your fingertips. Curl the barbell up by flexing your wrists. Squeeze at the top, then slowly lower back down.
cues: Let bar roll to fingertips for full ROM
commonMistakes: Not using full range of motion
tutorial.breathingPattern: Exhale on curl, inhale on lower
